name: The Art of Homunculi (IGJam9 Entry)
description:
In order to bring back a loved one from the dead, you turn to forbidden alchemy.

By solving smaller puzzles you get additional hints to solve the large mystery of resurrecting a human being.

Source Code
  • Download: https://github.com/BrutalHack/igjam9
  • License: GPL v3
Technology used

Unity, Jetbrains Rider, Git

Help / Controls

The game is played using the mouse.

Game Jam
  • InnoGames Jam 9
  • Theme: Strange Rituals
  • Time: 45 hours
Team
  • Benjamin Justice (Code)
  • Sergej Tihonov (Code)
  • Eike Wulff (Code)
